title: World Cup 2011 Schedule & Timetable released
content: The ICC Cricket World Cup 2011 will be held in the sub-continent South Asian countries: India, Sri Lanka and Bangladesh. Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai will be hosting the final of the Cricket World Cup 2011. Sri Lanka will play under Group A with Australia,Pakistan, New Zealan, Zimbabwe and Canada. ICC Cricket World Cup 2011 schedule has…
